text: Miguel dos Anjos da Cunha Lisboa Trovoada (born December 27, 1937) was Prime Minister (1975–1979) and President (1991–2001) of São Tomé and Príncipe. ==References== Trovoada, Miguel Category:Living people Category:Heads of state of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Prime Ministers of São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Miguel Trovoada
